name: Contra Voucher
description: Record transfers between cash and bank accounts.

name: Create Master
description: Create a new master (Ledger, Stock Item) on the fly from a voucher screen.

name: Create Ledger
description: Go to Accounts Info > Ledgers > Create to make a new ledger.

name: Create Stock Item
description: Go to Inventory Info > Stock Items > Create to add a new stock item.

name: Alter Master
description: Alter a master item directly from a voucher screen.

name: Profit & Loss Account
description: View the company's Profit & Loss statement.

name: Trial Balance
description: Go to Display > Trial Balance to view the trial balance.

name: Day Book
description: Go to Display > Day Book to see all vouchers for a day.

name: Change Period
description: Change the date of a voucher.

name: Company Features
description: Access the company features screen (e.g., Accounting, Inventory, Statutory).

name: Configure
description: Access configuration options for the current screen.
